scripts.acf-touch: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const dir='acf-json'; if(fs.existsSync(dir)){fs.readdirSync(dir).filter(f=>f.endsWith('.json')).forEach(f=>{const p=path.join(dir,f); const d=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8')); d.modified=Math.floor(Date.now()/1000); fs.writeFileSync(p,JSON.stringify(d,null,4)+'\n');console.log('Updated:',f);});}"
